predicate.note: Frames file for 'televise' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 25.4.

role.descr: who put it on tv, agent

example.name: adjectival
example.text: A crowd estimated at 100,000 held a torch-lit march through Budapest as Acting President Szuros delivered a nationally televised address rejecting communist dominance.

example.name: verbal
example.text: John's funeral was televised [*] -- on a public access channel, to be sure.
